casebody.data:
Anthony GRANDISON, petitioner,
v.
Mary Ann SAAR, former Secretary, Maryland Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services, et al. No. 12-9940. Supreme Court of the United States June 24, 2013.

*2882Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Maryland dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
